Detailed Description

This class updates the GenericDataHeader of an existing file with new information.

Member Function Documentation

bool GenericDataHeaderUpdater::Update ( std::ofstream &  fileStream,
GenericDataHeader &  updateHeader,
GenericDataHeader &  currentHdr 
)

Update the file with the new GenericDataHeader information. The current implementation just updates the FileId.

Parameters:
fileStream An output stream open with std::ios::out|stdios::binary|stdios::in.
updateHeader A GenericDataHeader with information to update the file.
currentHdr The GenericDataHeader object with the information currently in the file.
Returns:
Returns true if the FileId could be udpated.

bool GenericDataHeaderUpdater::UpdateFileId (  ) 

Update the FileId. Only update the FileId if update and current fileIDs are the same size.

Returns:
Returns true if successful.
